articles.author: The Republic | azcentral.com, Victor Ren, The Republic | azcentral.com
articles.title: Arizona prison officer arrested on suspicion of sexual conduct with minor
articles.description: Paul Thornton, 46, was arrested after police investigated a report of an adult male and juvenile female "making out."

articles.author: The Republic | azcentral.com, Ken Alltucker, The Republic | azcentral.com
articles.title: Florence prison doctor disciplined for prescribing testosterone, hormones during off-hours
articles.description: A doctor at Florence prison agrees to Arizona Medical Board order that includes probation for improperly prescribing testosterone and other hormones.

articles.author: The Republic | azcentral.com, Craig Harris, The Republic | azcentral.com
articles.title: Yuma officers tried to warn Corrections about riot, but officials ignored tip, attorney says
articles.description: Officers in Yuma warned Corrections about talk of a March 1 riot, but officials ignored the tip and understaffed the unit, attorney says.

articles.author: The Republic | azcentral.com, The Republic | azcentral.com
articles.title: Nevada sending 200 violent inmates to Arizona private prison in Eloy
articles.description: Nevada, facing a prison-bed shortage, will send 200 violent inmates, including gang members, to a CoreCivic private prison in Eloy, Arizona.

articles.author: The Republic | azcentral.com, Craig Harris, The Republic | azcentral.com
articles.title: Yuma inmates warned Corrections about potential for riot, but officials ignored tip, attorney says
articles.description: Inmates in Yuma warned Corrections about talk of a March 1 riot, but officials ignored the tip and understaffed the unit, attorney says.

articles.author: The Republic | azcentral.com, Michael Kiefer, The Republic | azcentral.com
articles.title: Did Arizona's inmate-care provider deny care to avoid fines? Judge hears testimony in case
articles.description: A hearing in U.S. District Court in Phoenix is addressing whether or not the inmate-care provider failed to care for inmates in order to avoid fines.

articles.author: The Republic | azcentral.com, Michael Kiefer, The Republic | azcentral.com
articles.title: Judge rejects state bid to remove him from Arizona prison health case
articles.description: The state could face fines for failing to agree to terms of settlement in suit alleging inadequate inmate care.
